string.value: I better talk to Agent #b#p1103003##k of #m101000000# about a new assignment.

#p1103003# told me she's starting to worry about the #bplants that are growing in #m101010000##k. It looks like she plucked out a fruit from one of those plants and got violently sick. She suspects that one of the Black Mage's men injected some poison in the plants. I better pluck out a fruit to see if it's true. \n\n#i4032143# #t4032143# #b#c4032143# / 10#k
I gave #t4032143# to #p1103003#. After looking through the charts, #p1103003# found out that the fruits that are being produced at this time of the year can cause food poisoning...
I think the plants at #m101000000# all seem suspicious! You know, the ones that grow from #b#m101010000##k.\n#b#L0#(...I can't believe she's completely neglecting to mention Arwen!)#l\n#k

Lately, the fruits from those plants seem stranger than before. It was right around that time where the fruits begin springing out from the plants. I just took a bite out of it and next thing I know, my body was burning and I eventually passed out! I am absolutely certain this is their attempt to assasinate me! We must investigate this fruit!

If you strike #bplants that grow in #m101010000##k, they'll drop some fruits every once in a while. If you can get me #b10 #t4032143#s#k, then we'll be able to find out if the Black Mage poisoned these fruits to kill us.

The plants look like this....

#i4032206#

Remember, it only works if you strike it with your regular attack!
How... how can you say that? My life is in danger here!
Did you bring #t4032143#? Hold on one second. Let me see this chart to check if any of them has any flaws.
...Eating fruits that grow around this time of the year may be subject to #rfood poisoning#k...

Were you not able to find #b10 #t4032143#s#k yet? Step out of #m101000000#, and you'll find a number of #bplants that resemble a fernbrake#k. #bStrike#k those plants with regular attacks, and #t4032143# will be dropped from those plants.
